articles.author: Matthew Rozsa
articles.title: Here's how that rumor that smokers can't get COVID-19 got started - Salon
articles.description: Three experts told Salon that people should not jump to conclusions about recent studies into nicotine and COVID-19
articles.content:
Old cigarette ads often made outrageous claims about cigarettes, including, infamously, that they could cure asthma. (They can't.) So the rumors that smokers might be at lower risk for contracting COVID-19 seem similarly specious.
Oddly, such rumors seemed t… [+6434 chars]

articles.title: Massachusetts health officials announce 174 new coronavirus deaths, 1,165 new cases - MassLive.com

articles.content:
Health officials on Wednesday announced that another 174 Massachusetts residents have died of coronavirus, bringing the total number of fatalities to 5,315.
